title: My Client keeps getting ERROR Messages

embed.description: Gyazo te permite hacer una captura de pantalla y subir la imagen/GIF a internet. Puedes compartir el contenido fácilmente vía Chat, Twitter, Blog, Tumblr, etc. Disponible para Windows, Mac y Linux.

body: it wont let me connect to the chat its been doing this since the new patch pls help

replies.body:
Hi Lysaaer

We're on the case and trying to get it fixed up!

Cheers
Mindstar
